name: Press Play
description:
A person finds himself stuck in a loop of his regular life cycle. In order to break it, he'll have to take a few wrong turns and explore the world around him a bit deeper than usual.

This is a Yume Nikki fangame (sort of), originally created for Dream Diary Jam 2018 and arriving past the deadline. I have plans for an update for this game but I'm not sure when it's going to happen.

Please install the FFFFORWA font from the game folder before playing.

Bug reports are highly appreciated.

Soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/user-145045121/sets/press-paly-ost
